EmailTemplate.description: MUM Re-admission Letter Confirmation to DEPT (before emailing student)
EmailTemplate.name: MUM Re-admission Letter Confirmation to DEPT (before emailing student)
EmailTemplate.subject: MUM Re-admission Letter Confirmation to DEPT (before emailing student)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear
Please find attached an MUM offer letter for (Student). Can you please carefully check the offer letter and all relevant information to ensure it is accurate. Once you have sent me an email confirming that all information is correct, I will then send the student the offer letter.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
